snippet: The police said Wednesday that they were confident that a hand and a foot mailed to two schools in Vancouver, British Columbia, came from a man who was killed and dismembered in Montreal.
abstract: Canadian authorities say that they are confident that a hand and a foot mailed to two schools in Vancouver, British Columbia, came from a man who was killed and dismembered in Montreal; Luka Rocco Magnotta, a Montreal resident, is in a Berlin jail awaiting extradition to Canada on several charges, including first-degree murder.
lead_paragraph: The police said Wednesday that they were confident that a hand and a foot mailed to two schools in Vancouver, British Columbia, came from a man who was killed and dismembered in Montreal.

headline.main: Canada: Police Link Body Parts to Murder Victim in Montreal
headline.print_headline: Canada: Police Link Body Parts To Murder Victim in Montreal
